plot: TV movie based on the singer's life, under his mother's thumb, competing with the ghost of one of the most famous singers in C&W music history, and aspiring to rise above it all.
title: Living Proof: The Hank Williams, Jr. Story
plot_es: TV movie based on the singer's life, under his mother's thumb, competing with the ghost of one of the most famous singers in C&W music history, and aspiring to rise above it all.
original_name: Living Proof: The Hank Williams, Jr. Story
